title.narrative: 003 RURAL WASH

description.narrative: By 2025, Children and families in rural areas have equitable access to basic inclusive WASH services, including in humanitarian situations.

mailing-address.narrative: UNICEF House (Kazanchis - Opposite UNECA/German House) P.O. Box 1169 Addis Ababa

sector.narrative: Hygiene in emergencies - handwashing facility with soap in communities
Sanitation and hygiene - institutions (schools, health care facilities, ECD centres) including menstrual hygiene management
Water supply - rural communities service delivery
Water supply in emergencies - improving water supply services communities

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents
